contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1393-2017 to designate 481 University Avenue (Maclean-Hunter Building, 1961) and 481 University Avenue, also known as 210 Dundas Street West (Maclean Publishing Company Building, 1928) (Toronto Centre-Rosedale, Ward 27) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE34.30 - Alteration of a Designated Heritage Property, Intention to Designate Under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act and Authority to Enter Into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 481 University Avenue (Including 210 Dundas Street West)

By-law 1393-2017 - To designate the property at 481 University Avenue (Maclean-Hunter Building, 1961) and 481 University Avenue, also known as 210 Dundas Street West (Maclean Publishing Company Building (1928) as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act  R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and  City of Toronto, Province of Ontario.
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1393-2017 - 481 University Avenue
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
